mapper.insert: insert into questionBoard(writer, title, content, pwd) values(#{writer}, #{title}, #{content}, sha1(md5(#{pwd})))
mapper.select: select max(no) as lastNo from questionBoard
mapper.update: update questionBoard set ref = #{lastNo} where no = #{lastNo}
update questionBoard set title = #{title}, content = #{content} where no = #{no} and pwd = sha1(md5(#{pwd}))
mapper.select: select count(*) as cnt from questionBoard where no = #{no} and pwd = sha1(md5(#{pwd}))
mapper.update: update questionBoard set isDelete = 'Y' where no = #{no} and pwd = sha1(md5(#{pwd}))
mapper.select: select * from questionReadCount where bno = #{bno} and ipAddr = #{ipAddr}
mapper.update: update questionBoard set readCount = readCount + 1 where no = #{bno}
update questionReadCount set readDate = now() where bno = #{bno} and ipAddr = #{ipAddr}
